definition: universal mercy and succor (idiom); the Buddha's infinite power and mercy
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
